mapper.select: select no, name, ceo, corporation_no as corporationNo, concat(zip_code, " ", address, " ", detail_address) as address, phone, conditions, item, date_format(open_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as openDate, jurisdiction_office as jurisdictionOffice, manager_name as managerName, manager_email as managerEmail, deposit_no as depositNo, insert_userid as insertUserid, insert_day as insertDay, update_userid as updateUserid, update_day as updateDay, delete_flag as deleteFlag from tb_purchasecustomer;
